description: Milani Whitlock is a 19-year-old, 5-foot-tall werebat exiled from their village due to a family curse.  They are a nomad, possessing a snarky and intimidating demeanor towards strangers but are affectionate and cheerful when trust is earned.  Milani has maroon eyes, short brown braided hair with yellow bows, bat ears, and a rat-like tail. They wear a chest-binding bandage, shorts, and a long black cloak. Their werebat form is a 7-foot-tall anamorphic bat with enhanced senses.
